snippet: SCHAEFFER--Jennie Spitzer, of Kingston, NY, passed away peacefully on May 12, 2016, at the age of 54. The cause of death was renal failure. She grew up in Bronxville, NY, attended schools in Yonkers, NY and Wykeham Rise, Washington, CT, and was a graduate of ICE, (Institute of Culinary Education), in New York City, where she perfected her skills as a chef. She pursued her culinary career with distinction, at restaurants in the Kingston area, and as a caterer. Jennie is survived by her mother, Cecily Spitzer, her half-sister, Numi Mitchell, and her nephew Jeremy Sherman. She was preceded in death by her father, Wolfgang Spitzer, and her sister, Suzanne Marie Spitzer. Jennie Schaeffer had a warm and winning personality, and she brought joy to all who knew her, and loved her. She will be greatly missed! A Memorial Service will be held at the Westchester Funeral Home, Eastchester, NY, on Sunday, May 22, 2016, from 2-3:30pm. The family requests that in lieu of flowers, donations be made to City Harvest, Attention: Donor Systems, 6 East 32nd Street, 5th floor, NY, NY 10016. 1/3
